title: Don't worry guys, Fiora is awful
body:
Her ult does not do any damage, it just allows the passive to proc 4 times. The heal is fantastic, but it's INCREDIBLY difficult to pull off by yourself. One slow or hard cc and you're fucked. It's best used on the frontline tank standing still.

Her Parry is fantastic, her Q and E are lackluster.

Very difficult to play, and the reward is fairly small.

Great in lane, bad in late game. Cannot assassinate ADCs.
